import numpy as np 
import pandas as pd 
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.db33bbe0:
serie = pd.Series(np.random.randn(10)) #Generar 10 numeros aleatorios y convertirlos en serie de Pandas
print(serie)
serie.plot()
df0 = pd.DataFrame(np.random.randn(10, 2),columns=['a','b'])
print(df0)
df0.plot()
source.a4bc212f:
ts = pd.Series(np.random.randn(1000),index=pd.date_range('1/1/2000', periods=1000))
print(ts)
ts = ts.cumsum()
print(ts)
ts.plot()
